name: When the teacher has to smack the answer outta u
name_original: When the teacher has to smack the answer outta u
description:
When the teacher has to smack the answer outta u is a game developed by Fadeaway899. It came out on 11-08-2021.
When the teacher has to smack the answer outta u is available on PC, macOS, Linux and Android. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
